meanings.definition: The living material within a cell, excluding the nucleus.
meanings.sent1: Under the microscope, the protoplasms in the cell were visible.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study protoplasms to understand cell structure.
meanings.sent3: The protoplasms in the cell were having a party without the nucleus.
meanings.sent4: The protoplasms danced like tiny stars in the dark cell.
meanings.sent5: The protoplasms pulsed with life, a vibrant dance of existence.

meanings.definition: The essential substance of living matter.
meanings.sent1: Healthy food provides the body with essential protoplasms.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study protoplasms to learn about nutrition.
meanings.sent3: The chef added extra protoplasms to the recipe for good luck.
meanings.sent4: Love is the protoplasms that binds us all together.
meanings.sent5: The protoplasms of nature hummed with energy and vitality.
